definition: cancers of the nose and throat/nasopharyngeal carcinoma (NPC)

sentences.english: Conclusion There exists some extent of setup error in nasopharyngeal carcinoma IMRT.
sentences.chinese: 结论鼻咽癌IMRT具有一定程度的摆位误差。

sentences.english: After extensive radiology treatment for throat cancer, Zhang Xinmei has been left weak and frail.
sentences.chinese: 接受放射线治疗鼻咽癌之后，张馨镁变得非常虚弱。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the cause for misdiagnose of nasopharyngeal carcinoma (NPC) with headache as initial appearance.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨以头痛为首发症状的鼻咽癌患者的误诊原因。

sentences.english: To standardize the conventional external irradiation technique for nasopharyngeal carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 规范鼻咽癌常规外照射技术。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of oxygen-carrying ability of blood efficacy of radiotherapy for patients with nasopharyngeal carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨血液携氧能力对鼻咽癌放疗效果的影响。

sentences.english: Nasopharyngeal carcinoma often invades the intracranial and extracranial space and cavities.
sentences.chinese: 鼻咽癌常侵犯颅内或颅外周围的间隙和腔窦。

sentences.english: Does Shanghai cure nasopharyngeal carcinoma rotating the shoulder osteocarcinoma family hospital well?
sentences.chinese: 上海治疗鼻咽癌转肩部骨癌哪家医院好？

sentences.english: Objective To study relationship between expression of basement membrane (BM) in carcinoma of nasopharynx .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨鼻咽癌中基膜表达与肿瘤生物学特性的关系。

sentences.english: A complete solution for computer simulation of nasopharyngeal carcinoma brachytherapy was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 一个完整的鼻咽癌近距离放疗仿真的方案被提出。

sentences.english: It is suggested that the overexpression of P53 protein is associated with cervical metastasis.
sentences.chinese: 提示P53蛋白过度表达与鼻咽癌颈淋巴结转移有关。

sentences.english: Concomitant radiochemotherapy has become the standard treatment of local advanced nasopharyngeal carcinoma now.
sentences.chinese: 目前同步放化疗已成为局部晚期鼻咽癌的标准治疗。

sentences.english: Objective To study the influence of different radiotherapy on nasopharyngeal carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨不同的放射治疗方法对鼻咽癌的疗效。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the association between nasopharyngeal carcinoma(NPC) and allergic disease.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨鼻咽癌发病与变态反应性疾病的关系。

sentences.english: Objective To improve local control rate and total survival rate of local later period nasopharyngeal carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高局部晚期鼻咽癌的局部控制率及总生存率。

sentences.english: Study of Jiangni tang on gastrointestinal reaction during radiotherapy of nasopharyngeal carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 降逆汤加减治疗鼻咽癌放疗所致胃肠副反应的研究。
